author: Adrian Collins
description:
Grimdark Magazine had the absolute honour of hosting the exclusive cover reveal for Anderson Versus Death written by our ridiculously talented friend Anna Smith Spark back in May. I was then lucky enough to get my hands on an advanced copy of the novel. It was my first experience stepping in to the off screen world […]

The post EXCLUSIVE: Extract from Anderson Versus Death by Anna Smith Spark appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: EXCLUSIVE: Extract from Anderson Versus Death by Anna Smith Spark
